actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to protect individuals from unreasonable searches and seizures.
short_title: Third Party Search Protection Act of 1979
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Third Party Search Protection Act of 1979 - Prohibits the issuance of a warrant to search premises not under any control of a suspect in a crime under investigation except upon a finding, based on recorded non-hearsay evidence, that there is a high probability that the objects sought will be concealed, destroyed, or altered.

titles.title: Third Party Search Protection Act of 1979
A bill to protect individuals from unreasonable searches and seizures.
